long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TranscribeMyAudio.ai transcribes mp3 files into text AFFORDABLY with SPEED. It is also able to identify multiple speakers automatically.

We are proud to be the most affordable transcription service online as our prices are BELOW £0.50 per minute!!

Our speech-to-text AI technology is fast, accurate and requires NO lengthy Sign-up! All you need to provide is the audio file and a working email to receive your transcription. 

Our cutting-edge artificial intelligence will astound you with its speed and accuracy. In most cases, a one-hour high-quality audio recording can be transcribed in less than 15 minutes.

We accept Mp3 audio only but don’t worry you will be able to convert any audio to mp3 very easily.

Furthermore, we've created an interactive editor (similar to Microsoft Word in your browser) that allows you to proofread, carry out qualitative analysis and save your transcriptions!

Make sure to download the extension shortcut to get quick access to all the  benefits stated above!
